name: Spinaroo
description:
A laid back 2D platformer.

Play just by using the arrows.

Works for Windows, Android and IOs, although it was designed for Windows.

(This is only a prototype)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

First game done in Construct 2. Developed for the Game Production class over a period of one week.

Hope you like it.

<ANY FORM OF FEEDBACK IS WELCOME!>

A game by Filipe Ribeiro.
